p: A structural model of the HBV-RT using the SWISS-MODEL package was generated (Figure 4 (Fig. 4)). Three main subdomains in the HBV-RT structure were identified: the finger, residues 1-49 and 90-172, the palm, residues 50-89 and 173-267 and the thumb, residues 268-351. Nevertheless, differences between the models were found (Figure 4 (Fig. 4)). Homology comparison between HBV-RT model and HIV-1-RT template suggested a similar structural conformation with a root mean square deviation (rmsd) of 2.1 Å for the Cα atoms (Table 2 (Tab. 2)).
